name: Trials of the Gods
description:
An action, RPG, roguelike heavily inspired by games like Risk of Rain and Enter The Gungeon. Pick 1 out of 4 playable classes and be the one challenger to complete the Trials Of The Gods in order to ascend. Only one warrior will be selected will you be the one the complete the challenge?

**NOTE** - Game is still in the early stages, there are lost of bugs and crashes, but the game is slowly but surely becoming finished. Originally started as a project for Intermediate Game Dev Class.

- Game Might Crash or even be unplayable, as stated above the game is in the very early stages.
